Summary: Strange stationary lights in the southwest sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsI live in East Haven CT the water. Over the last week on two separate occasions I have seen between two and three strange lights in the southwest sky around 9:15 in the evening while I am on my deck. They look like planets and they stay stationary for around 30 to 40 minutes. The first time I noticed the lights they were changing colors from white to blue to red. On the last occassion it was solid white color. Both times after watching them for twenty minutes I would go inside and periodically check on them. Eventually forty minutes later they would be gone.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in East Haven
There were no other sightings in East Haven on or around September 23rd 2007
